name: Deep Sea Believer
description:
Players take on the role of Murloc, who is imprisoned in a secluded cell by an ancient sea God.  The God informs players that his believers are gone due to humans invading, and that his domain has fallen into ruin. This game requires the player, the last true believer, to find three relics and conduct a ritual in the deep ocean to bring the God back into the world.

Developers:

Lead Programmer - Felix Reason

Lead Artist - Sienna Wilton

Lead Designer - Zhouran Wei
